title: Communicating outputs
body:
This module will look at how data can be effectively communicated. By the end of the module participants will be able to:

  • Select appropriate methods to communicate insights from data - Look how effective it was. 
  • Be aware of the many forms of communicating data - audio, touch, smell, immersive experiences, 3D models
  • Describe the role of effective narrative in data communication
  • Identify the core aspects of a good data visualisation
  • Identify deception in visually represented data - Done in exploratory data analysis 
  • Importance of dynamic/interactive/exploratory data visualisation

_skills.outcome: Define the key questions that can be answered with data
Identify opportunities for data to be integrated into existing or create new projects within ARUP
Identify a number of tools and methods to integrate data into projects
